overview: An orphan who is paying her way through school by being a waitress falls in love with an engineer from an influential family however meeting his family causes a painful part of the past for all of them, to be dredged up. Starring Segun Arinze, Jennifer Eliogu, Michael Godson, Sophie Alakija, Moyo Lawal and Tamara Eteimo.
title: A Time To Heal
